page.title: 09Shopping in Scotter
page.content: The majority of Scotter's shops are concentrated around the junction of {High Street and the A159.}There is a wide range of food shops (including a bakery) and a large selection of non food shops selling a wide range of items.These range from pet foods to welding supplies.Several of the shops in the latter group have changed owners and merchandise in the last few years.Most shops try to sell a wide variety of goods eg.a newsagent which also sells clothing.A survey carried out by school children revealed that the majority of people questioned thought that Scotter was a good place to shop.Everybody did some shopping in Scotter but also used the{superstores in Scunthorpe and Gainsborough.The survey also revealed that people would like to see a large clothing and shoe shop open in Scotter.
